EmailTemplate.name: 201804_Americas_Nurture_TFE731_Certified Engine Exchanges_JRD.201804_Americas_Nu
EmailTemplate.subject: Purchase a Certified Honeywell TFE731 in Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Customer,
Exchanging your current Honeywell TFE731 engine with us takes no more than a couple minutes! Well, as long as our computers are behaving!
Exchange your existing engine with confidence knowing that you’ll get an engine that’s been tested, inspected and warrantied by Honeywell. And, when you exchange your engine with us, you’ll receive a credit for your old engine!
Browse our certified, pre-owned TFE731 inventory and choose the engine that’s right for you today.
VIEW ENGINE LISTINGS <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/godirect-services/certified-engine-exchanges]]>
